article.title: EBRD Procurement Opportunities
article.summary: A listing of Consultancy/Procurement Opportunities available at the EBRD for which US companies are eligible to bid.
article.content:
The EBRD's financing activities generate many opportunities for suppliers, contractors and consultants worldwide. The EBRD's Procurement Policies and Rules are based on the fundamental principles of non-discrimination, fairness and transparency. They are designed to promote efficiency and effectiveness and minimize risk in the implementation of the Bank's lending and investment operations.

Below are current Consultancy/Procurement Opportunities available at the EBRD for which US companies are eligible to bid. Please do contact our office for any advice or guidance.

  • Procurement Notices
